headline.main: Pressure of War Splinters Israel's Left

lead_paragraph: For more than 20 years, a name with a plain message has animated the broadest Israeli movement to end the conflict with Palestinians: Peace Now. But now, it seems, was then, or perhaps peace was a dream. Out of realism or despair, and with a darkened sense of humor, the mainstays of the Peace Now movement are casting about for alternatives. They talk about a ''Deal Now'' or even an ''Arrangement Now.''
abstract: Mainstays of Israel's Peace Now movement are casting about for alternatives after months of violence and Palestinian terrorist attacks; photos (M)
